p: According to the above results, the suitable habitat N. jatamansi varies greatly under different climate scenarios and was more affected by climate change. However, the potential distributions of N. chinensis showed a growing trend in different climate scenarios compared to its current situation and was less affected by climate change. Therefore, in order to avoid the impact of climate change on the artificial cultivation of the genus Nardostachys, and achieve stable development, we could choose N. chinensis as the main cultivated species.
